titles: No vvhippinge, nor trippinge: but a kinde friendly snippinge
author: Breton, Nicholas, 1545?-1626?
publisher: [By R. Bradock?] for Iohn Browne, & Iohn Deane,
notes: A reply to: W.I.  The whipping of the satyre.
